description: This intimate and romantic restaurant occupies an old 18C rural house which is situated in a small hamlet in the Cembra valley. In two small dining rooms with a vaguely modern feel, the husband serves just one tasting menu, from which guests can choose two menus of different lengths, featuring delicious, well-presented, contemporary Italian cuisine prepared by his wife.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Maestro', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
